featured.text: Medvedev Vladimir, 43, and his son, Maxsine, 14, sailed from an unnamed eastern Russian seaport on August 18, to begin an ambitious around-the-world cruise.

definition.zh_def: 弗拉基米爾，一個常見的斯拉夫男性名字，源自於古斯拉夫語，意為「統治者」或「擴張者」。
definition.en_def: Vladimir is a common Slavic male name derived from Old Slavic, meaning 'ruler' or 'to rule with greatness'.
definition.example: Vladimir is known for his leadership skills and strong presence in the community.
